009
010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012import imagingbook.common.histogram.Util;
013
014/**
015 * <p>
016 * This is an implementation of the global "quantile" thresholder, described in
017 * Sec. 9.1 (Alg. 9.1) of [1].
018 * </p>
019 * <p>
020 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
021 * </p>
022 * 
023 * @author WB
024 * @version 2022/08/01
025 */
026public class QuantileThresholder implements GlobalThresholder {
027        
028        private double b = 0.5; // quantile of expected background pixels
029
030        public QuantileThresholder() {
031                super();
032        }
033        
034        public QuantileThresholder(double b) {
035                super();
036                this.b = b;
037        }
038
039        @Override
040        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
041                int K = h.length;
042                int N = Util.sum(h);
043                
044                double n = N * b;       
045                int i = 0;
046                int c = h[0];
047                while (i < K && c < n) {
048                        i++;
049                        c+= h[i];
050                }
051                
052                int q = (c < N) ? i : -1; 
053                return q;
054        }
055}
